Author: pes1374
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸ”· ðŸ”· Akilos (ALS)-Smart Solution and Decentralized Betting NetworkðŸ”·
Body: What is Akilos ? Akilos has Created an Application Network for Betting Services . It also has a Platform, Utilizing Artificial intelligence, that has created a Safe Environment for Fair and Direct Deals. The Akilos Platform are able to Connect to Casino Smart Systems and Other Betting Services. By using the Artificial intelligence Technology, the Akilos can Reduce Costs and Create a Safe and Non-fraudulent Environment.  How Does Token Work in Akilos ?  Akilos tokens or in short ALS is use for betting and competition between users and networkâ€™s people, and it is moving between peoples who enter the betting contracts in a well-defined and framework-based process in complete security.  What is Smart Contract Bet? Betting smart contracts are the contracts that users can bet their desired bets by using it, such that people can conclude their smart contracts by using 6 contract modes. We created six betting conditions for the network to ensure that it supports a variety of modes. These contractual modes are planned using artificial intelligence of the network.  When MVP ?  Our programming team is currently building an initial version of the platform and it  will be released in Q2 2019 .   About Token  Token Symbol: ALS Platform: Ethereum (ERC20) Price in ICO: Round 1 :  1 ALS = 0.0075 ETH /0.67 USD Round 2 :  1 ALS = 0.01 ETH /0.9 USD Tokens for sale: 10,000,000 ALS     Round 1 : 3,000,000 ALS      Round 2 : 7,000,000 ALS Total Supply: 15,000,000 ALS Investment Information  Min: 0.1 ETH Accepting: ETH Tokens for sale in ICO: 67% Soft Cap: 9000 ETH /$800,000 USD Hard Cap: 92500 ETH /$8,200,000USD  link to tokensale Guide page : https://akilos.net/crowdsale/    Website  https://akilos.net/  Whitepaper  Social Media                                                    twitter                          reddit                         youtube                       telegram                        github                         medium
